TopicTitle: KSP stops responding when loading/reverting certain craft.

Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.3.1 64bit

Problem: When creating a certain craft, and launching it, everything is fine. But when I revert to hangar, the game freezes and crashes. Also, after crashing, and trying to load in that craft, the game freezes and crashes again. All my backup saves still aren't able to load it either. 

Mods installed: https://i.imgur.com/Jm3LXtt.png All mods are up to date.

KSP_Log:  https://www.dropbox.com/s/z7t8155yizmd3g7/KSP .log?dl=0

Output_Log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/fz20a2q1dg0hfal/output_log.txt?dl=0

Reproduction Steps: I don't know how to reproduce it, it just happens to nearly all my craft. I am able to give the craft file though, if it does anything. 

Mods for craft: https://i.imgur.com/addKnyf.png

Craft file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/dh5193zsczvd2vl/Sukhoi SU-27 Flanker UB.craft?dl=0

 

Edited April 14, 2018 by Sebastiaz
